Package com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.mock

Contains a mock implementation for a complete functional controller.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IMockControllerStateListener Callback interface for state changes of a sunrise controller.
IMockExecutionContainer Interface for mocking execution containers.
IMockSPRHook Implementing classes may register themselves at a MockExecutionService.
 

Class Summary
LBRKinematic Helper class to calculate a simple forward and inverse kinematics value for a LBR.
MockController Mock controller class.
MockControllerStateListenerAdapter Base implementation of a mock-specific controller listener.
MockDeviceList The list containing the devices for the Mock controller.
MockExecutionContainer An ExecutionContainer for Mock controller commands.
MockExecutionContainerForMotion An ExecutionContainer for motion commands.
MockExecutionService Mock execution service implementation.
MockExecutor Mocks to execute a container and performs it's lifecycle.
MockLaserSensor Mock class for a LaserSensor.
MockLaserSensor.MockLaserSensorData Sensor data used by the mock laser sensor.
MockLBR Represent a mock LBR.
MockMotionContainer Mock Motion container.
MockRequestService Mock implementation of a request service.
MockSafetyState Class to get the state of mock safety signals.
SimulatingMockDeviceState This device state is able to send out simulation data.
 

Package com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.mock Description

Contains a mock implementation for a complete functional controller.

This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.
